text: Bengal Cricket Academy Ground is a cricket ground in Kalyani, West Bengal, India. The first recorded match on the ground was in 2011/12. It was used as a venue for a first-class match in the 2015–16 Ranji Trophy tournament between Bengal and Odisha. It had previously hosted four List A matches in the 2014–15 Vijay Hazare Trophy. ==See also== * List of cricket grounds in India ==References== ==External links== *Bengal Cricket Academy Ground at CricketArchive Category:Cricket grounds in West Bengal Category:2011 establishments in India
title: Bengal Cricket Academy Ground
